anya-e1210n1:1103: Sītaṁ uṇhaṁ jighacchā pipāsā uccāro passāvo thinamiddhaṁ jarā byādhi maraṇanti idaṁ kāyānuvattakadasakaṁ nāma.
anya-e1210n1:1104_0: Buddhe sagāravo, dhamme sagāravo, saṅghe sagāravo, sabrahmacārisu sagāravo, uddesaparipucchāsu
anya-e1210n1:1104_1: vāyamati, savaṇabahulo hoti, bhinnasīlo’pi ākappaṁ upaṭṭhāpeti, garahabhayā kāyikavācasikañcassa
anya-e1210n1:1104_2: surakkhitaṁ hoti, padhānābhimukhaṁ cittaṁ hoti, karontopi pāpaṁ paṭicchannaṁ ācaratī’ti
anya-e1210n1:1105_3: uposathasamādānato dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetī’ti ekantojudiṭṭhitāya uposathasamādānato dakkhiṇaṁ
anya-e1210n1:1105_4: visodhetī’ti ekantojudiṭṭhitāya uposathasamādānato dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetī’ti idaṁ dakkhiṇāvasena dasakaṁ nāma.
anya-e1210n1:1106: Alagganatā, nirālayatā, vāgo, pahāṇaṁ, apunarāvattitā, sukhumatā, mahantatā, duranubodhatā, dullabhatā asadisatā, buddhadhammassā’ti idaṁ bodhisattaguṇadasakaṁ nāma.
anya-e1210n1:1107_0: Majjajadānaṁ, samajjadānaṁ, ithidāṁ, asabhadānaṁ, cittakammadānaṁ, visadānaṁ, sathadānaṁ,
anya-e1210n1:1107_1: saṅkhalikadānaṁ, kukkuṭasūkaradānaṁ, tulākūṭa mānanakūṭadānananti idaṁ loke adānasammatadānaṁ nāma.
anya-e1210n1:1108_0: Mātā badhanaṁ, pitā badhanaṁ, bhariyā badhanaṁ, puttā badhanaṁ, ñātī badhanaṁ, mittābadhanaṁ,
anya-e1210n1:1108_1: dhanaṁ badhanaṁ, lābhasakkārobadhanaṁ, issariyaṁ badhanaṁ, pañcakāmaguṇā badhananti
anya-e1210n1:1109_0: Vidhavā ithi, dubbalo puggalo, amittañātipuggalo, mahagghaso, anācāriyakulavāsī,
anya-e1210n1:1109_1: pāpamitto, dhanahīno, ācariyahīno, kammahīno, payogahīno puggalo’ti idaṁ oñātabbapuggaladasakaṁ nāma.
anya-e1210n1:1110: Dame same khantisaṁvare yame niyame akkodhe vihiṁsāya sacce soceyye’ti dasaṭṭhānesu satataṁ cittaṁ pavattatī’ti idaṁ vessantaraguṇadasakaṁ nāmā’ti.
anya-e1210n1:1112_0: 11. Ākāsassa ekādasa guṇā nibbānaṁ anuppaviṭṭhā? Na jāyati, najiyyati, na miyyati,
anya-e1210n1:1112_1: na cavati, na uppajjati, duppasayho, acoraharaṇo, anissito, vihaṅgagamano, nirāvaraṇo,
anya-e1210n1:1113: Sīlapākāraṁ …pe… satipaṭṭhānavīthikanti idaṁ dhammanagaraparivārekādasakaṁ nāmā’ti dve ekādasakā vuttā.
anya-e1210n1:1114_0: 12. Ratto rāgavasena apacitiṁ na karoti, duṭṭho dosavasena, mūḷho mohavasena, unnaḷomānavasena,
anya-e1210n1:1114_1: nigguṇo avisesatāya, atithaddho atisedhatāya, hīno hīnabhāvatāya,vacanakaro anissaratāya,
anya-e1210n1:1114_2: pāpo kadariyatāya, dukkhāpito dukkhāpitatāya, luddho lobhavasena, āyūhito athasādhanavasena
anya-e1210n1:1114_3: apacitiṁ na karotīti idaṁ apacitiakārakapuggaladvādasakaṁ nāma ekameva āgataṁ.
anya-e1210n1:1115_2: sosānikaṅgaṁ yathāsathatikaṅgaṁ nesajajikaṅganti idaṁ dhutaṅgaterasakaṁ nāma ekameva.
anya-e1210n1:1117_3: kesesu lūyantesu socanti kilamanti paridevanti urattāḷiṁ kadanti sammohaṁ āpajjantīti
anya-e1210n1:1118_0: Tiracchanagato peto micchādiṭṭhito kuhako mātughātako pitughātako arahantaghātako
anya-e1210n1:1118_1: lohituppādako saṅghabhedako tithiyapakkantako theyyasaṁvāsako bhikkhunīdūsako terasannaṁ
anya-e1210n1:1118_2: garukāpattīnaṁ aññataraṁ āpajjivā avuṭṭhito paṇḍako, ubhatobyañjanako, ūnasattavassako’ti
anya-e1210n1:1119_0: 17. Abhijānato sati uppajjati kaṭumikāya, oḷārikaviññāṇato hitaviññāṇato ahitaviññāṇato
anya-e1210n1:1119_1: sabhāganimittato vīsabhāganimittato kathābhiñañāṇato lakkhaṇato saraṇato muddato
anya-e1210n1:1119_2: gaṇanāto dhāraṇato bhāvanato potthakanibadhanato upanikkhepato anubhutato sati uppajjatīti
anya-e1210n1:1121_0: 19. Suti sumuti saṁkhyayogā ñāyavesesikā gaṇitā gadhabbā tikicchā catubbedā purāṇā
anya-e1210n1:1121_1: itihāsajotisā māyā hetu mantanā yuddhā chadasā buddhavacanena ekūnavīsatīti idaṁ
anya-e1210n1:1122_0: 22. Aggo yamo seṭṭho niyamo hāro vihāro saṁyamo saṁvaro khanti soraccaṁ ekantacariyā
anya-e1210n1:1122_1: ekattābhirati paṭisallānaṁ hiri ottappaṁ vīriyaṁ appamādo sikkhāpadānaṁ uddeso paripucchā
anya-e1210n1:1122_2: sīlādiabhirati nirālayatā sikkhāpadapāripūritāti bāvīsatisamaṇakaraṇā dhammā kāsāvadhāraṇaṁ
anya-e1210n1:1122_3: bhaṇḍubhāvo cā’ti dve liṅgāni pakkhipivā vadanakāraṇaguṇabāvīsatikaṁ.
anya-e1210n1:1123_0: 25. Ārakkhā sevanā ceva pamattappamattā tathā seyyāvakāso gelaññaṁ bhojanaṁ labbhakañceva
anya-e1210n1:1123_1: viseso ca vijāniyā pattabhattaṁ saṁvibhaje assāso ca paṭicāro gāmaviharaṁ cārā be
anya-e1210n1:1123_2: sallāpo pana kātabbo chiddaṁ disvā khameyya ca sakkaccākhaṇḍakārī dve arahassāsesakāri
anya-e1210n1:1123_3: dve janeyya janakaṁ cittaṁ vaḍḍhicitataṁ janeyya ca sikkhābale ṭhapeyya naṁ mettaṁ
anya-e1210n1:1123_4: cittañca bhāvaye. Na jahe apadāya ca karaṇīye ca ussukaṁ paggahe khalikaṁ dhamme.
anya-e1210n1:1123_5: Iti paṁcavīsa guṇāmilidena pakāsitā’ti idaṁ antevāsikamhi ācariyena kataguṇapaṁcavīsatikaṁ
anya-e1210n1:1124_0: Kodho upanāho makkho palāso issā macchariyaṁ māyā sāṭheyyaṁ thamho sāramho māno atimāno
anya-e1210n1:1124_1: mado pamādo thinamiddhaṁ nadi ālasyaṁ pāpamittatā rūpā saddā gadhā rasā phoṭṭhabbā
anya-e1210n1:1124_2: budhā pipāsā aratīti idaṁ cittadubbalīkaraṇadhammapañcavīsatikanti dve pañcavīsatikā vuttā.
anya-e1210n1:1125_0: 28. Paṭisallānaṁ paṭisalliyamānaṁ puggalaṁ rakkhati. Āyuṁ vaḍḍheti, balaṁ vaḍḍheti,
anya-e1210n1:1125_1: vajjaṁ pidahati, ayasaṁ apaneti, yasaṁ upadahati, aratiṁ apaneti, ratiṁ upadahati,
anya-e1210n1:1125_2: bhayaṁ apaneti, vesārajjaṁ karoti, kosajjaṁ apaneti, vīriyaṁ abhijaneti, rāgaṁ apaneti,
anya-e1210n1:1125_3: dosaṁ apaneti, mohaṁ apaneti, mānaṁ nihanti, vitakkaṁ bhañjati, cittamekaggaṁ karoti,
anya-e1210n1:1125_4: mānasaṁ sinehayati, hāsaṁabhijaneti, garukaṁkaroti, mānaṁ uppādayati, namassiyaṁ
anya-e1210n1:1125_5: karoti, pītiṁ pāpeti, pāmojjaṁ karoti, saṅkhārānaṁ sabhāvaṁ dassayati, bhavapaṭisadhiṁ
anya-e1210n1:1126_0: Mahosadho mahārāja sūro, hirimā, ottāpī, sapakkho, mittasampanno, khamo, sīlavā,
anya-e1210n1:1126_1: saccavādī, soceyyasampanno, akodhano, anatimānī, anusūyako, vīriyavā, āyūhako, saṅgāhako,
anya-e1210n1:1126_2: saṁvibhāgī, sakhilo, nivātavutti, asaṭho, amāyāvī, buddhisampanno, kittimā, vijjāsampanno,
anya-e1210n1:1126_3: hitesī upanissitānaṁ, abhirūpo dassanīyo, pathito sabbajanassa, dhanavā yasavā’ti
anya-e1210n1:1126_4: idaṁ mahosadhaguṇaṭṭhavīsatikaṁ iti dve aṭṭhavīsatikā vuttā.
anya-e1210n1:1127_0: 30. Imehi terasahi dhutaguṇehi pubbe āsevitehi nisevitehi ciṇṇehi pariciṇṇehi caritehi
anya-e1210n1:1127_1: paripūritehi nimittabhūtehi ariyasāvako idha bhave tiṁsaguṇavarehi samupeto hoti
anya-e1210n1:1127_3: hoti, hatanihatamānadappo hoti, acaladaḷhaniviṭṭhanibbematikasaddho hoti, paripuṇṇa-pīṇita.
anya-e1210n1:1127_5: hoti, devamanussānaṁ piyo hoti manāpo, khīṇāsava-ariyapuggala-pathito hoti, devamanussānaṁ
anya-e1210n1:1127_6: vaditapūjito thutathavitathomitapasatho, idha vā huraṁ vā lokena anupalitto, appathokavajje’pi
anya-e1210n1:1127_9: akuppadhammo, ahīnītavāso, anavajjabhogī, gativimutto, uttiṇṇasabbavicikiccho, vimuttijjhāyitatto,
anya-e1210n1:1128_0: Jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, byādhipi dukkho, maraṇampi dukkhaṁ, sokopi paridevopi
anya-e1210n1:1128_1: dukkho,upāyāsopi appiyehi sampayogopi piyehi vippayogopi, mātumaraṇampi pitumaraṇampi
anya-e1210n1:1128_2: bhātumaraṇampi bhaginimaraṇampi ñātimaraṇampi ñātibyasanampi bhogavyasanampi sīlabyasanampi
anya-e1210n1:1128_3: diṭṭhibyasanampi rājabyasanampi corabyasanampi veribhayampi dubbhikkhabhayampi aggibhayampi
anya-e1210n1:1128_4: dukkhaṁ, udakabhayampi dukkhaṁ, ūmibhayampi āvaṭṭabhayampi kumbhīlabhayampi suṁsumārabhayampi
anya-e1210n1:1128_6: parisasārajjabhayampi ājīvikabhayampi maraṇabhayampi mahābhayampi vettehi tāḷanampi
anya-e1210n1:1128_7: kasāhi tāḷanampi aḍḍhadaṇḍakehi tāḷanampi hathacchedampi pādacchedampi nāsacchedampi
anya-e1210n1:1128_9: jotimalikampi hathapajjotikampi erakavattikampi cīrakavāsikampi eneyyakampi balisamaṁsikampi
anya-e1210n1:1128_11: telena osiñcanampi sunakhehi khādāpanampi jīvasūlāropaṇampi asināsīsacchedanampīti
anya-e1210n1:1129_0: Saṅkhamuṇḍakanti saṅkhamuṇḍakammakaraṇaṁ taṁ karontā uttaroṭṭhassa ubhayato kaṇṇacūḷikagalavāṭakaparicchedena
anya-e1210n1:1129_1: cammaṁ chidivā sabbakese ekato gaṇṭhiṁ kavā daṇḍakena veḍhavā uppāṭenti saha kesehi
anya-e1210n1:1129_2: cammaṁ uṭṭhahati tato sīsakaṭāhaṁthūlasakkharāhi ghaṁsivā dhovantā saṅkhavaṇṇaṁ karonti.
anya-e1210n1:1130_0: Tatha biḷaṅgathālikanti kañjiyokkhalikakammakaraṇaṁ. Taṁ karontā sisakaṭāhaṁ uppāṭevā
anya-e1210n1:1130_1: tattaṁ ayoguḷaṁ saṇḍāsena gahevā tatha pakkhipanti. Tena mathaluṅgaṁ pakkaṭhivā upari uttarati.
anya-e1210n1:1131: Rāhumukhanti rāhumukhakammakaraṇaṁ. Taṁ karontā saṅkunā vivarivā antomukhe dīpaṁ jālenti. Kaṇṇacūḷikāhi vā paṭṭhāya mukhaṁ nikhādanena khaṇanti lohitaṁpaggharivā mukhaṁ pūreti.
anya-e1210n1:1134_0: Erakavattikanti erakavattakammakaraṇaṁ. Taṁ karontā heṭṭhāgivato paṭṭhāya cammavaṭṭe
anya-e1210n1:1134_1: kantantā gopphake pātentī atha naṁ yottehi badhivā kaḍḍhanti. So attano’vacammavaṭṭe
anya-e1210n1:1134_2: akkamivā patati cīrakavāsikanti cirakavāsikakammakaraṇaṁ. Taṁ karontā tatheva cammavaṭṭe
anya-e1210n1:1134_3: kantivā kaṭiyaṁ ṭhapenti. Kaṭito paṭṭhāya kantivāgopphakesu ṭhapenti. Uparimehi heṭṭhimasarīraṁ
anya-e1210n1:1135_0: Eṇeyyakanti eṇeyyakakammakaraṇaṁ. Taṁ karontā uhosu kapparesu ca jaṇṇukesu ca ayasalākayo
anya-e1210n1:1135_1: davā ayasūlāni koṭṭenti. So catuhi ayayulehi bhumiyaṁ patiṭṭhahati. Atha naṁ parivārevā
anya-e1210n1:1135_2: aggiṁ karonti. Taṁ sadhisadhito sūlāni apanovā catuhi aṭṭhikoṭīhiyeva ṭhapenti.
anya-e1210n1:1137: Kahāpaṇakanti sakala sarīraṁ tiṇhāhi vāsīhi koṭito paṭṭhāya kahāpaṇa mattaṁ kahāpaṇa mattaṁ pātentā koṭṭenti.
anya-e1210n1:1138: Khārāpatacchikanti sarīraṁ tatha tatha āvudhehi paharivā kocchehi khāraṁ saṁsenti cammamaṁsanahārūni paggharivā aṭṭhakasaṅkhalikā’va tiṭṭhati.
anya-e1210n1:1139: Paḷighaparivattakatī ekena passena nipajjāpevā kaṇṇaṇacchidde ayasūlaṁ koṭṭevā pathaviyā ekabaddhaṁ karonti atha naṁ pāde gahevā āvijjhanti.
anya-e1210n1:1140_0: Palālapīṭhikanti cheko kāraṇiko chavicammaṁ acchidivā nisadapotakehi aṭṭhini bhidivākesakalāpe
anya-e1210n1:1140_1: gahevā ukkhipanti. Maṁsarāsiyeva hoti. Atha naṁ keseheva pariyonadhivā gaṇhanti palālavaṭṭiṁ
anya-e1210n1:1141: Imañca saṭṭhividhaṁ dukkhaṁ sallakkhevā bhavesu nibbidivā virajjivā bhavataṇhaṁ pahāvā dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ dukkhānupassanā ñāṇena passitabbanti.
anya-e1210n1:1142: Diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasatanti pañcasattati sekhiye apanevā sesānaṁ vasena diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṁ veditabbanti.
anya-e1210n1:1144: Caturādhikasatesu gahetabbathesu pana catuttiṁsa ekathānī, catuttiṁsa dveyathāni soḷasa tyathāni, paṁca caturathāni, terasa pañcathāni, dve sattathānī’ti.
anya-e1210n1:1158_3: vādīvarena mahākavinā suvipulavimalabuddhinā mahātipiṭaka- cūḷābhayathero’ti garūhi
